articles.description: Welcome to the website. I hope you enjoy it!

            About me
            Welcome to my personal website! I am a second-year
            graduate student of the Applied Statistics for Social
            Science program at NYU Steinhardt as well as a recent
            graduate from Macalester College, obtaining bachelor degrees
            in both Economics and Applied Mathematics & Statistics.
            I have used R programming language since my first year in
            college. I enjoy using R for machine learning, data
            analysis, data visualization and creating Shiny apps.
            
            
            Education
            New York University | New York, NY
            MS in Applied Statistics for Social Science Research,
            Sept. 2022 ~ Present
            Macalester College | St Paul, MN
            BA in Economics and Applied Math & Statistics,
            Sept. 2018 ~ May, 2022
